alert.note: Alert for Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Colville Reservation; Methow Valley; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 10 at 2:50AM PDT until August 11 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING FOR THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 702 THROUGH 706... The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a Fire Weather Watch for thunderstorms, which is in effect from this evening through Thursday morning. * Affected Area: Fire Weather Zone 702 Colville Reservation (Zone 702), Fire Weather Zone 703 Okanogan Valley (Zone 703), Fire Weather Zone 704 Methow Valley (Zone 704), Fire Weather Zone 705 Foothills of Central Washington Cascades (Zone 705) and Fire Weather Zone 706 Waterville Plateau (Zone 706). * Thunderstorms: Scattered thunderstorms containing brief rain is may develop this evening through Thursday morning. * Outflow Winds: Gusty and erratic winds can be expected with thunderstorms. * Impacts: Thunderstorms combined with dry fuels may result in new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central Washington Cascade Foothills; Colville Reservation; Methow Valley; Okanogan Valley; Waterville Plateau
